channel.title: PDF on Voxcaster
channel.description: Recent content in PDF on Voxcaster

item.title: PDF Expert vs PDF XChange
item.description: I work in engineering - one of the main formats that gets shared around a lot is the humble PDF. It often means that you can view exactly what the other person sees without the hassle of sharing additional items - I’m thinking CAD files here, where an architect may include a lot of references to external files within the CAD file that matches what the architect uses on the system, but won’t be installed in the same location or at all, on the clients machine.
